replies.body:
{{champion:17}}  Keep your eyes peeled guys

{{champion:17}}  Oh wait.. Aatrox stepped on one of my shrooms!

{{champion:266}} /all oh dang.

{{champion:17}}  Go Gangplank use your ult!

{{champion:41}}  Shots fired sir.

{{champion:17}}  Oh why didn't you go ap?

{{champion:41}}  Because I don't like my oranges. Im more into DEEZ NUTS!

{{champion:17}}  Stupid whacko.

{{champion:17}}  Ashe, use your global. And I hope you went ap.

{{champion:22}}  Don't worry sir, I have 3 Rabies Deathhats.

{{champion:17}} What? Why did you use hawkshot?

{{champion:22}} My ult is on cooldown. You said use my global. Only my e is up.

{{champion:17}}  Your kidding...

{{champion:17}}  STUFF YOU YA USLESS ASHEHOLE!

{{champion:41}} Shots fired alright.

{{champion:17}} Draven, don't stuff up.

{{champion:119}}  Don't worry, I won't.

{{champion:17}}  Well I've heard that before...

_One minute later...

{{champion:17}} Hurry up!

{{champion:119}}  I haven't farmed yet.

{{champion:17}} I don't really care. JUST SHOOT!

(Does 50 damage)

{{champion:17}}  Oh what a disgrace...

{{champion:119}} All I wanted was fame. FAME!

{{champion:17}}  Yo jungle ezreal, I need to check you have all my requirements 

{{champion:81}}  Well I have farmed, got 3 Rabies Deathhats, and I will not miss.

{{champion:17}} Hopefully. But you have to do the most damage you can do.

{{champion:81}}  Right sir.

Ally Executed

{{champion:17}}  WHAT???

{{champion:81}} You told me to do the most damage. I need blue buff to do that.

{{champion:17}}  Hopeless. YOU ARE SO HOPELESS YOU GIRL DANCING DING DONG!

{{champion:41}} Man I like this dude.

{{champion:17}} Umm. (awkwardly walks backward)

{{champion:17}} I.. Jinx I need a WildTurtle snipe. From you. Please.

{{champion:222}} Ask me if I'm listening. Since, I'm not!

{{champion:17}} NO NO NO NO!

TSM WildTurtle (Jinx) has slain the dragon!

{{champion:17}} I didn't mean that.

{{champion:17}} Oh well.
